steps.name: User already open the website sauce demo
User input "standard_user" as username "secret_sauce" as password
User filters the list of product by text "Name (Z to A)"
User clicking "Test.allTheThings() T-Shirt (Red)" of item into a cart
User clicking "Sauce Labs Onesie" of item into a cart
User already on "Your Cart" as cart page
User remove first item in cart
User filling "shamima" as firstName, "khan" as lastName and "12270" as postal code
User navigating to checkout overview page
